Name: PVWatts

Items.StringList: Fixed open rack|Fixed roof mount|1-axis tracking|1-axis backtracking|2-axis tracking

Caption.String: For 2-axis tracking, the ground coverage ratio is only used for land area calculations
Module Area Estimate for Land Area Calculations
System losses account for performance losses you would expect in a real system that are not explicitly calculated by PVWatts.

array_type.Label: Array type
array_type.IndexLabels: Fixed open rack|Fixed roof mount|1-axis tracking|1-axis backtracking|2-axis tracking

Equations: eff = ?${module_type}[0.19,0.21,0.18]; // [standard,premium,thin film], see cmod_pvwattsv7.cpp module.stc_eff for each module.type
Callbacks: property('gcr_pvwatts_warning', 'Caption', 'For 2-axis tracking, the ground coverage ratio is only used for land area calculations');
// do this here instead of equations so
// versions.lk will work for opening files
show( 'batt_simple_enable', 0 ); // hidden variable set by equations
